ghostPost.title: DSNP Update: October 2021
ghostPost.excerpt:
A belated update! 

In October, our contributors continued the chain selection process. We are
looking to spend more time with this community in 2022 and appreciate your
recommendations for events and conferences to attend or sponsor. As always, we
invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at 
forums.projectliberty.io [https://forums.projectliberty.io/].

October DSNP update - Summary of progress

 * Chain selection: Reviewed over 30 chains. Managed to rule out more than
ghostPost.plaintext:
A belated update! 

In October, our contributors continued the chain selection process. We are
looking to spend more time with this community in 2022 and appreciate your
recommendations for events and conferences to attend or sponsor. As always, we
invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at 
forums.projectliberty.io [https://forums.projectliberty.io/].

October DSNP update - Summary of progress

 * Chain selection: Reviewed over 30 chains. Managed to rule out more than
   two-thirds. Updates to come.
 * Example client: Maintenance tasks.
 * Looking into moving all of our Parquetjs 1
   [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/parquetjs/issues/26] files left in JavaScript
   to TypeScript.

Upcoming

 * SDK: Looking into splitting SDK into one or more smaller packages.
 * Example client: New release; includes UI improvements, improved logging.
 * DSNP.org 2 [http://dsnp.org/] website updates: Improved developer onboarding
   instructions.
ghostPost.html:
A belated update!

In October, our contributors continued the chain selection process. We are looking to spend more time with this community in 2022 and appreciate your recommendations for events and conferences to attend or sponsor. As always, we invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io.

October DSNP update - Summary of progress

  • Chain selection: Reviewed over 30 chains. Managed to rule out more than two-thirds. Updates to come.
  • Example client: Maintenance tasks.
  • Looking into moving all of our Parquetjs 1 files left in JavaScript to TypeScript.

Upcoming

  • SDK: Looking into splitting SDK into one or more smaller packages.
  • Example client: New release; includes UI improvements, improved logging.
  • DSNP.org 2 website updates: Improved developer onboarding instructions.
